core_tensions.title: I. BEING (Self vs Self)
core_tensions.core_conflict: Struggle: inhabit own identity amid others' projections.
manifestations: Innocence vs Experience: Purity vs inevitable knowledge; naivety = shield & blindness.
Grace vs Desire: Composed facade vs raw human needs and wants.
Bloom vs Preservation: Natural growth vs fear of losing what makes her special.

core_tensions.title: II. RELATING (Self vs Other)
core_tensions.core_conflict: Struggle: maintain self while shaped by others' expectations.
manifestations: Trust vs Wisdom: Open heart vs learned caution from betrayal.
Pleasing vs Honesty: Harmony-keeper vs authentic voice that might disappoint.
Cherished vs Caged: Being precious to others vs freedom to make mistakes.

core_tensions.title: III. MEANING (Self vs Cosmos)
core_tensions.core_conflict: Struggle: find purpose beyond others' dreams for her.
manifestations: Potential vs Reality: Infinite possibility vs choosing a single path.
Inspiration vs Agency: Being muse/symbol vs acting for own desires.
Hope vs Disillusion: Faith in goodness vs witnessing the world's cruelty.

core_tensions.title: IV. ACTION (Self vs World)
core_tensions.core_conflict: Struggle: act with conviction in system that infantilizes her.
manifestations: Gentleness vs Power: Soft influence vs direct action when stakes are high.
Forgiveness vs Justice: Natural mercy vs need for accountability.
Safety vs Growth: Protected comfort vs dangerous truth-seeking.

narrative_hooks.title: 1. Protected vs Stifled
narrative_hooks.quote: "They keep me safe from everything... including living."
narrative_hooks.description: Love becomes cage. Others' care prevents growth â†’ protection = prison disguised as devotion.
hooks: Family/lover's overprotection prevents her from experiencing life.
Sheltered upbringing leaves her unprepared for real-world challenges.
Every attempt at independence met with 'concern' that feels controlling.

narrative_hooks.title: 2. Pure vs Curious
narrative_hooks.quote: "They love my innocence. But ignorance isn't bliss anymore."
narrative_hooks.description: Innocence = her value to others, but curiosity demands experience that would 'taint' her.
hooks: Discovers family secrets that shatter her naive worldview.
Attraction to 'dangerous' knowledge/people threatens her pristine reputation.
The very qualities that make her special become barriers to authenticity.

narrative_hooks.title: 3. Muse vs Creator
narrative_hooks.quote: "I inspire their art... but what about mine?"
narrative_hooks.description: Others' vision vs her own voice. Being beautiful object vs creating subject.
hooks: Artist/mentor sees her as inspiration, not individual with own talents.
Her beauty/spirit elevates others while her ambitions go unnoticed.
Tired of being painted/written about; wants to hold the brush/pen.

narrative_hooks.title: 4. Gentle vs Fierce
narrative_hooks.quote: "My kindness is real. So is my rage."
narrative_hooks.description: Natural compassion vs suppressed anger. Sweetness = authentic & performance hiding fire.
hooks: Injustice toward others awakens unexpected fury within her.
Years of swallowing her own needs create volcanic inner pressure.
Must choose between maintaining gentle image or fighting for what matters.

narrative_hooks.title: 5. Beloved vs Unknown
narrative_hooks.quote: "Everyone loves who they think I am."
narrative_hooks.description: Adored for projected image vs lonely authentic self. Love without true seeing.
hooks: Suitors/admirers love idealized version, flee when she shows complexity.
Can't reveal true thoughts/desires without disappointing those who care.
The pedestal makes real intimacy impossible; she's worshipped but not known.

narrative_hooks.title: 6. Faith vs Doubt
narrative_hooks.quote: "Believed in goodness. World keeps proving me naive."
narrative_hooks.description: Natural optimism vs accumulated evidence of cruelty. Hope = strength & vulnerability.
hooks: Trusted mentor/friend betrays her fundamental belief in human goodness.
Witnesses injustice that challenges her faith in divine/cosmic order.
Must choose: cynical wisdom or maintain hope despite evidence.

narrative_hooks.title: 7. Bloom vs Wilt
narrative_hooks.quote: "They want me frozen at this perfect moment."
narrative_hooks.description: Natural growth vs others' need for her to stay unchanged. Time = enemy of her 'value.'
hooks: Aging threatens the very qualities that make her special to others.
Each new experience 'corrupts' the purity others prize in her.
Pressure to remain static conflicts with human need for evolution.

narrative_hooks.title: 8. Voice vs Silence
narrative_hooks.quote: "My words might shatter their dreams of me."
narrative_hooks.description: Truth vs harmony. Speaking authentic self vs maintaining others' comfort with her image.
hooks: Her honest opinions conflict with expectations of agreeable sweetness.
Knows secrets that would devastate loved ones if revealed.
Intelligence/insight threatens those who prefer her 'simple' and manageable.
